import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { prods1 } from "../assets/prods1" import { FaRupeeSign } from "react-icons/fa" import Sidebar from "./Sidebar" import Navbar from "./Navbar" import axios from 'axios' function Aditem(){ const url='http://localhost:4001' const ff=['note','name','price','rating'] const [img,setImg]=useState() const cats=['toys','stationary','books','bags','bottles'] const aitems=prods1 const [data,setData]=useState({ slug:'', price:'', cat:'', note:'', img:'', rating:'', price1:'',}) useEffect(()=>{ console.log(data) },[data]) async function handleS(e){ alert(data) e.preventDefault() const fdata=new FormData() fdata.append("name",data.name) fdata.append("price",data.price) fdata.append("cat",data.cat) fdata.append("note",data.note) fdata.append("img",data.img) fdata.append("rating",data.rating) const res=await axios.post(`${url}/aitem`,fdata) if(res.data.success){ setData({ slug:'', price:'', cat:'', note:'', img:'', rating:'', price1:'' }) toast('Item added') }else{ } } const handleC=(e)=>{ const name=e.target.name const val=e.target.value setData(data=>({...data,[name]:val})) console.log(data) } return( <>
< div className="grid grid-cols-2 w-120">

NAME

VALUE

{ff.map((item,i)=>(<> {handleC(e) }}> )) }
{handleC(e);setImg(e.target.files[0])}} >
)} export default Aditem
